lyric:
[00:00.000] 作词 : Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:01.000] 作曲 : Finneas O'Connell/Billie Eilish O'Connell
[00:17.434]I had a dream
[00:20.969]I got everything I wanted
[00:24.787]Not what you'd think
[00:28.706]And if I'm bein' honest it might've been a nightmare
[00:34.774]To anyone who might care
[00:41.360]Thought I could fly (Fly)
[00:44.662]So I stepped off the Golden, mm
[00:49.236]Nobody cried (Cried)
[00:52.848]Nobody even noticed
[00:55.349]I saw them standing right there
[00:58.984]Kinda thought they might care (Might care, might care)
[01:01.756]
[01:05.035]I had a dream
[01:08.704]I got everything I wanted
[01:11.872]But when I wake up I see
[01:14.007]You with me
[01:17.924]
[01:19.325]And you say, "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you"
[01:27.816]Don't wanna lie here, but you can learn to
[01:36.765]If I could change the way that you see yourself
[01:44.302]You wouldn't wonder why you hear, "They don't deserve you"
[01:51.254]
[01:53.322]I tried to scream
[01:56.572]But my head was underwater
[02:01.290]They called me weak
[02:04.609]Like I'm not just somebody's daughter
[02:06.849]Coulda been a nightmare
[02:10.318]But it felt like they were right there
[02:14.287]And it feels like yesterday was a year ago
[02:19.471]But I don't wanna let anybody know
[02:23.740]'Cause everybody wants something from me now
[02:27.550]And I don't wanna let 'em down
[02:30.143]
[02:33.277]I had a dream
[02:36.729]I got everything I wanted
[02:39.913]But when I wake up I see
[02:44.063]You with me
[02:46.431]
[02:47.699]And you say, "As long as I'm here, no one can hurt you"
[02:55.377]Don't wanna lie here, but you can learn to
[03:03.855]If I could change the way that you see yourself
[03:12.325]You wouldn't wonder why you hear, "They don't deserve you"
[03:18.728]
[03:20.195]If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
[03:24.497]Would I do it again?
[03:27.848]If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
[03:32.766]What would they say instead?
[03:36.036]If I knew it all then, would I do it again?
[03:40.203]Would I do it again?
[03:43.788]If they knew what they said would go straight to my head
[03:48.287]What would they say instead?
tlyric:
[00:17.434]我做了一个梦
[00:20.969]我已拥有我渴望的一切
[00:24.787]不是你所想的一切
[00:28.706]如果要我说的话 这一切或许只是一场噩梦
[00:34.774]对于那些还有可能在乎我的人来说
[00:41.360]曾以为我能够飞上天际
[00:44.662]所以从金门大桥上 我纵身一跃（Golden＝Golden Gate Bridge）
[00:49.236]没有人为我哭泣
[00:52.848]甚至没有人注意到我
[00:55.349]我看到他们就站在那儿
[00:58.984]还以为他们会对我施以援手
[01:01.756]
[01:05.035]我做了个梦
[01:08.704]我拥有了我渴望的一切
[01:11.872]但我醒来 却发现
[01:14.007]只有你还在身边
[01:17.924]
[01:19.325]而你说  只要我在你身边 没有人能将你伤害
[01:27.816]不想再一次说谎 但你可以学会对我说谎
[01:36.765]如果我能够改变你对于自己的看法
[01:44.302]你就不会怀疑自己 不会听到他人的贬低
[01:51.254]
[01:53.322]我想要尖叫
[01:56.572]但我的声音却深埋于水下
[02:01.290]他们说我脆弱不堪
[02:04.609]但我也只是自己的父母心爱的女儿啊
[02:06.849]这本该是一场噩梦
[02:10.318]但感觉却如此真实
[02:14.287]感觉好像昨天已经是一年之前的事
[02:19.471]但我不想让任何人知道
[02:23.740]因为现在每个人都想从我这捞点好处
[02:27.550]我绝对不会让他们失望
[02:30.143]
[02:33.277]我做了个梦
[02:36.729]我拥有了我渴望的一切
[02:39.913]但我醒来 却发现
[02:44.063]只有你还在身边
[02:46.431]
[02:47.699]而你说  只要我在你身边 没有人能将你伤害
[02:55.377]不想再一次说谎 但你可以学会对我说谎
[03:03.855]如果我能够改变你对于自己的看法
[03:12.325]你就不会怀疑自己 不会听到他人的贬低
[03:18.728]
[03:20.195]若我早知晓一切 我是否还会重蹈覆辙
[03:24.497]是否还会重蹈覆辙
[03:27.848]如果他们知道自己的每一句话都会被我刻骨铭心
[03:32.766]他们会说些什么
[03:36.036]若我早知晓一切 我是否还会重蹈覆辙
[03:40.203]是否还会重蹈覆辙
[03:43.788]如果他们知道自己的每一句话都会被我刻骨铭心
[03:48.287]他们又会说些什么
